mapper.sql: GOODSID, GOODSCOMPANY, GOODSCODE, GOODSNAME, GOODSDETAIL, GOODSUNITS, GOODSCLASS, GOODSIMAGE, GOODSSTATUE, CREATETIME, UPDTIME, CREATOR, UPDOR, GOODSBRAND, GOODSTYPE, GOODSORDER
mapper.select:
select count(distinct goodsid) from goods g left outer join goodsclass gc on g.goodsclass = gc.goodsclassid left outer join prices p on p.pricesgoods = g.goodsid left outer join largecusprice lcp on lcp.largecuspricegoods = g.goodsid where g.goodsstatue = '上架' and p.pricesclass = #{pricesList[0].pricesclass} and p.priceslevel = #{pricesList[0].priceslevel} and (lcp.largecuspricecompany = #{goodscompany} or lcp.largecuspricecompany is null )
and (g.GOODSCODE like '%${goodscode}%' or g.GOODSNAME like '%${goodscode}%' or g.GOODSUNITS like '%${goodscode}%' or g.GOODSCLASS like '%${goodscode}%' or g.GOODSSTATUE like '%${goodscode}%' or g.CREATOR like '%${goodscode}%' or g.UPDOR like '%${goodscode}%' or gc.goodsclassname like '%${goodscode}%')

select * from (select A.*, ROWNUM RN from ( select distinct g.*,p.pricesid,p.pricesprice,p.pricesunit,p.pricesprice2,p.pricesunit2,lcp.largecuspriceprice ,lcp.largecuspriceunit,lcp.largecuspriceunit2,lcp.largecuspriceprice2,lcp.largecuspriceid,gc.goodsclassname ,lcp.largecuspricecreatetime from goods g left outer join goodsclass gc on g.goodsclass = gc.goodsclassid left outer join prices p on p.pricesgoods = g.goodsid left outer join largecusprice lcp on lcp.largecuspricegoods = g.goodsid where g.goodsstatue = '上架' and p.pricesclass = #{goods.pricesList[0].pricesclass} and p.priceslevel = #{goods.pricesList[0].priceslevel} and (lcp.largecuspricecompany = #{goods.goodscompany} or lcp.largecuspricecompany is null )
and (g.GOODSCODE like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or g.GOODSNAME like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or g.GOODSUNITS like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or g.GOODSCLASS like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or g.CREATOR like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or g.UPDOR like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or gc.goodsclassname like '%${goods.goodscode}%')
order by g.createtime,lcp.largecuspricecreatetime desc nulls last ) A where ROWNUM <= (#{nowpage}*#{pagesize}) ) where RN > ((#{nowpage}-1)*#{pagesize})

select * from (select A.*, ROWNUM RN from ( select distinct goods.*, gc.goodsclassname, gc.goodsclassid from goods left join goodsclass gc on gc.goodsclassid = goods.goodsclass left join prices p on p.pricesgoods = goods.goodsid where goods.goodscompany = #{goods.goodscompany} and p.pricesclass = '3' and p.creator = '启用'
and goods.goodsstatue = #{goods.goodsstatue}
and (goods.GOODSCODE like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or goods.GOODSNAME like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or goods.GOODSUNITS like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or goods.GOODSCLASS like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or goods.GOODSSTATUE like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or goods.CREATOR like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or goods.UPDOR like '%${goods.goodscode}%' or gc.goodsclassname like '%${goods.goodscode}%')
order by goods.createtime,goods.goodsid desc ) A where ROWNUM <= (#{nowpage}*#{pagesize}) ) where RN > ((#{nowpage}-1)*#{pagesize})

select goods.*, prices.*, goodsclass.goodsclassname from goods left outer join prices on prices.pricesgoods = goods.goodsid left outer join goodsclass on goods.goodsclass = goodsclass.goodsclassid where goods.GOODSCODE = #{goodscode} and prices.pricesclass = #{customertype} and prices.priceslevel = #{customerlevel} and prices.creator = '启用'

select goods.*, prices.pricesid, prices.pricesclass, prices.priceslevel, prices.pricesprice, prices.pricesunit, prices.pricesprice2, prices.pricesunit2, prices.createtime, prices.creator pricescreator, prices.updor, goodsclass.goodsclassname from goods left outer join prices on prices.pricesgoods = goods.goodsid left outer join goodsclass on goods.goodsclass = goodsclass.goodsclassid where goods.GOODSID = #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into GOODS
GOODSID,
GOODSCOMPANY,
GOODSCODE,
GOODSNAME,
GOODSDETAIL,
GOODSUNITS,
GOODSCLASS,
GOODSIMAGE,
GOODSSTATUE,
CREATETIME,
UPDTIME,
CREATOR,
UPDOR,
GOODSBRAND,
GOODSTYPE,
GOODSORDER,
#{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodscompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update GOODS
GOODSCOMPANY = #{goodscompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSCODE = #{goodscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSNAME = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSDETAIL = #{goodsdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSUNITS = #{goodsunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSCLASS = #{goodsclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSIMAGE = #{goodsimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSSTATUE = #{goodsstatue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDTIME = #{updtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDOR = #{updor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSBRAND = #{goodsbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSTYPE = #{goodstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODSORDER = #{goodsorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where GOODSID = #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
